a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global primary energy consumption by source

Primary energy is based on the
substitution method
and measured in terawatt-hours .
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024); Smil (2017)
Note: In the absence of more recent data, traditional biomass is assumed constant since 2015.
